overview: Join Liberace in his hot air balloon as he touches down at the Hilton Hotel in Las Vegas, Nevada and jumps on stage for a Valentine's Day concert like no other! There's also a tour of the Liberace Museum, his private home and the Queen Mary where Sandy Duncan and Lola Falana join him in song, dance and laughter.
tagline: Roses are red, rhapsodies are blue. Liberace has a special Valentine for YOU!
title: Liberace: A Valentine Special
